question: ####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] If the Runner uses Algernon to gain , but then uses [Dr. Lovegood](/en/card/09042) to blank Algernon, is it still trashed at the end of the turn if the Runner doesn't make a successful run?
answer:
Yes. Once triggered, Algernon's ability exists independently of the source card, so the second part of its ability will still trigger when the turn ends.

Audited by Null Signal Rules (2022.05).
